title: Why most businesses get stuck with their website
point1: Agencies are rigid: High upfront fees often force you to pay for features you don't need yet.
point2: DIY is frustrating: Builders like Wix look easy until you need to fix a mobile layout or add custom logic.
point3: Maintenance is a chore: Who updates your plugins? Who gets the site back online if it crashes?
point4: You're locked in: Need a simple text change? Often you have to pay a developer again or fight with a confusing dashboard.
description: I handle the technical complexity so you can focus on your business. Two flexible models, both professionally managed.
